text: HBO Max is Warner Brothers discoveries
direct to Consumer platform offering
best-in-class quality entertainment we
have around 95 million direct to
Consumer subscribers globally across
other platforms we had to solve for
massive content storage as we continue
to offer an ever-growing catalog of
Premium content across our linear and
direct-to-consumer platforms with a fast
growing media supply chain our
challenges with security observability
and business continuity Acro and the
need for a simple durable secure and
cost effective content store increased
we primarily use AWS to solve for scale
with a strong focus on security
following AWS recommended best practices
we migrated petabyte scale content to
Amazon S3 and built a secure and robust
content supply chain using Amazon S3
replication we created secure immutable
cross account and cross-region backups a
streamlined content supply chain on AWS
has enabled our internal teams to
securely manage content content across
our media supply chain simplify
integration with other AWS services like
Elemental media convert and also recover
from failures we realized cost savings
using S3 intelligent hearing and archive
storage shares which are significant
given our scale with observability using
AWS cloudtrail Cloud watch and open
search we can continuously monitor for
our storage growth identify areas of
optimization and proactively detect and
respond to anomalies
[Music]
